sqlMap.select: select POSITION_NO as no, POSITION_NAME as name, POSITION_SEQ as seq from comm_positions order by position_no asc
sqlMap.update: update comm_positions set POSITION_NAME = #name#, POSITION_SEQ = #seq# where position_no = #no#
sqlMap.select: select POSITION_NO as no, POSITION_NAME as name, POSITION_SEQ as seq from comm_positions where position_no = #value#
